channel.title: Argh Banning
channel.description:
Well let's see. To ban an IP you go copy the IP, then paste it into bannedips.
But, I have a problem. Whenever I do it, they can still get on. What I mean is, they can make a new account, and log on ONCE, but after they log out it with the account it says there banned. It partly works, and partly doesn't. They can keep making new accounts. So help please?

item.title: Argh Banning

well the best way to do it is go find another source copy and paste its ip baneer file into ur s overright urs then w8 for them to log in
